Smart Washing Machine: Create a washing machine that can detect the type of fabric and adjust the washing cycle and water temperature accordingly. This machine can also automatically detect when a load is finished and signal the user to transfer the clothes to the dryer. Confidence Score: 0.8

Portable Washing Machine: Design a compact, portable washing machine that can be easily carried around and used in any location. This machine can be powered by a rechargeable battery and can be used for washing clothes, bedding, and even delicates. Confidence Score: 0.9

Self-Cleaning Washing Machine: Develop a washing machine that can clean itself by using UV light to kill bacteria and other microorganisms that can accumulate inside the machine. This machine can also have a self-cleaning filter that can be easily removed and replaced. Confidence Score: 0.9

Wi-Fi Enabled Washing Machine: Create a washing machine that can be controlled remotely using a smartphone app. This app can allow users to schedule washes, monitor the machine's status, and even receive notifications when the cycle is complete. Confidence Score: 0.8

Eco-Friendly Washing Machine: Design a washing machine that uses minimal water and energy, while still providing excellent cleaning results. This machine can use a unique water-saving technology that can reduce water consumption by up to 50%. Confidence Score: 0.9
